author: Staff Reporter
title: Why exclude us from COVID-19 meet: Owaisi
content: All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen president Asaduddin Owaisi on Sunday questioned his partys exclusion from the Prime Ministers COVID-19 video conference of parliamentarians, and termed this as an tauheen (insult) to the people of Hyderabad and Aurangaba… [+973 chars]
